data.description:
Free Brotherhood update is AVAILABLE NOW. Introducing: 3-player Co-op, A Remastered Singleplayer Adventure and Enhanced Graphics.
![{"height":882,"type":"image","width":2160}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031410_1446151866267096_4556869722959842675_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3C9_I9j5UI0Q7kNvgGtu_J0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYChF4ClkPcWRRWvBT7m4sxdhdtnQEjPVL1xLsSh2Sq-GQ&oe=66CF18E2)
**3-player Co-op:**

Forge a brotherhood with up to two fellow wizards and use your class-specific skills (Fire, Frost and Storm) to battle new types of enemies and variants, plus explore the levels with new challenges. 

**A Remastered Singleplayer Adventure:**

A mysterious dark plague has fallen on the realm of Meliora, twisting its inhabitants into beings of hatred and madness. Forbidden powers and rogue wizards are involved, leaving you to face the apocalypse head-on. 

**Enhanced Graphics & VR Controls:**

Experience the game at a whole new level, with beautifully rendered graphics, optimized for latest VR advancements.
![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":2160}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035326_1375039763177988_5553215525068839764_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=i-7X4VBpujwQ7kNvgEb4uzn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA8eFXNWwP4sC_h28vp-O82A600EQ2Khg6GiTdazKgu4Q&oe=66CF0D5D)
Embark on a perilous journey across the plague-ridden realm of Meliora, and experience the end of the world as you know it.

Discover and master 11 individually designed spells of various uses and effects. Forget about button combinations! Command the arcane powers with nothing but hand gestures - as a true Wizard does!
 
Dare to journey through the blighted Forest, wade through the poisonous swamps of Meliora, descend into the ruinous Necropolis, and more - with no magical barriers to stop you!

# Features: 
- Action-adventure VR spellcaster set in a rich fantasy world
- Improved system of casting spells with hand gestures
- New spells and enemies 
- New region of Meliora to explore
- New Game+, Hardcore Mode and Sandbox Arena Mode

![{"height":580,"type":"image","width":2160}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974669_479483717985105_515339853048355485_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NNGENlaOAzwQ7kNvgFp-nHa&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAg2YbM_kzdeQ8FsZllU1JskCHMxXmQjk_vhxeaQMGJTA&oe=66CEE81B)

changelog.change_log:
- Added a global cross-play feature between all supported platforms.
- Added improved global mechanics to control spatial sounds in the land of Primeweald
- Improving the volume balance of spells, especially the explosion of the magic shield in Primeweald Trials
- All spells in Primeweald Trials (Coop mode) received a sound upgrade
- Increased spell resistance of magic shields for all wizard classes in Primeweald Trials (Coop mode)
- Reduced teleportation rod regeneration time from 3 seconds to 1.5 seconds. This makes gameplay smoother and more fun to tactically move around arenas in Primeweald Trials (Coop mode)
- Fixed the error related to displaying the incorrect name from HUB to Citadel in Primeweald Trials (Coop mode)
- Fixed the error related to displaying the incorrect name from achievements to challenge in Primeweald Trials (Coop mode). Now players will not be confused reaching new challenges
- Rebuilt the entire Citadel after the goblin army attack
- Reworked the main menu and profile selector
- Adjusted and fixed the pendulums in the Enchanted Forest in Primeweald Trials (Coop mode)
- Redesigned the In-Game Menu and Summary Menu to display better for players, improving user comfort
- Fixed the replication of the Darkling Bomb, which sometimes didn't explode
- Added an icon and color code to indicate unlocked new spells
- Optimized graphics and improved performance in Campaign and in Primeweald Trials (Coop mode)
- Optimized most of the opponents, now spawns should be smoother than ever
- Fixed the problem with the Korean and Japanese translations in the boss fight level in the campaign
- Created an additional tutorial explaining the resistance of elemental enemies in the Prologue in the campaign
- Added a widget with information about the level of the player with whom you are fighting together against Abigail's minions

Patch 1.25 - Meta Quest

- Added a new enemy in Multiplayer - Shroom King
- Optimized graphics and improving performance in Singleplayer and coop modes
- Optimized the number of game setting saves, now the game should load a little faster
- Changed the way of launching music tracks in multiplayer mode, now more track variety is present
- Added more exploding vases in multiplayer levels
- Fixed a problem with the Darkling bomb sound not firing sometimes
- Disabled friendly fire from darkling bombs, now darklings don't kill each other
- Fixed the problem with the sound not firing in the UI in multiplayer mode
- Global increase in texture resolutions and improving the settings of displayed triangles in some meshes
- Fixed an issue with player speed settings not saving correctly in Singleplayer mode. Now settings from singleplayer mode do not affect settings in multiplayer mode
- Added the possibility for clients to approve and confirm decisions, now the clients entering the portal can approve/confirm the game and start it
- Added the possibility for clients to approve the return to HUB
- Fixed a bug with the indicator displayed in multiplayer mode under the pause menu, now indicator does not display after exiting the pause menu
- Added burnable flags in multiplayer mode
- Improved damage mechanics of Meteor Lance spell, now deals damage once instead of multiple times
- Added an option in Multiplayer to disable above the player's name, especially can be useful when recording footage
- Changed the way of streaming levels in the Tutorial Level, now it works more smoothly and efficiently
- Added an additional UI with the player's name above the challenge board in Multiplayer
- Added signs above the main exits to improve player navigation through the rooms in Multiplayer
- Added gold color to player names in displayed messages when a player joins the Multiplayer game
- Improved “small” tutorials in Multiplayer with displayed hand spirits showing how to enchant spells, now they are more dynamic and optimized
- All Enemies in Multiplayer have their lives reduced by 15% and each player receives 15% more life
